name: Contract Agent Sniper Shooter
description:
Bring the fire to the next level in the contract agent sniper shooter in the fight against the brutal savage enemies surrounding you from every side. Take sniper and bring their deaths to the battlefield. Contract agent sniper shooter struggle against the tyranny of the heinous enemies. Enemies with big guns have captured the watch towers and your fellow military soldiers are in danger.
Contract Agent Sniper Shooter Features:
• Heavy artillery campaigns of sniper killing
• Enemy agents surrounding the commando are dangerous
• First person sniper shooting against the ferocious terrorists
• Open the lens, zoom and identify the target, locate, aim, inhale, pull the trigger, shooting, kill.
• Multiple mission of detailed army soldier sniper fighting against dangerous enemies.
• Touch to drag the arrow pointer to the enemies after you zoom it.
• Slow motion bullet flying around towards the enemies.
• Realistic bullet hit shot and amazingly immaculate graphics are added in the game.
• Realistic bullet shot sniper sounds to support the artistic gameplay.
